title: A Must Know for Mastering Healthy Habits
description:
When a habit becomes your roadblock, how do you break the unhealthy dynamic? Plus, Jillian talks about the importance of personalizing your workout, and things you can do to enhance your physical and emotional health and well-being.


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Send us your brief question at jillianpodcast@gmail.com
